des: If you are a business owner, start your day with a quick marketing tip from Lorraine Ball, the owner of Roundpeg. From web design and social media to marketing strategy and motivation, pick up one idea every day to move your busienss forward. Just a few words is a daily marketing tip from Roundpeg.
